main event: Observers reported a bright white object as large as two full moons illuminating the area, hovering at about 30 feet above the ground on November 3, 1966.
interesting points: The object was reported to hover at a distance of about six blocks away., Witnesses described the object as being large and bright enough to illuminate the entire area., There were multiple witnesses who confirmed they saw the same object., The sighting occurred under cloudy weather conditions., The object appeared to be solid, with a white color and darker spots observed on it.
witness description: children in the area who reported the sighting to the Air Force
